inventoryInfo.description: Magazine Capacity: 75/Caliber: 7.62x51mm NATO Red Tracer/Rate of Fire: 700 RPM/Fire Mode: Auto/Zeroing: 100m-1800m//The C6 is Canada's domestically-produced variant of the FN MAG. Magazine Capacity: 75/Caliber: 7.62x51mm NATO Red Tracer/Rate of Fire: 700 RPM/Fire Mode: Auto/Zeroing: 100m-1800m//The C6 is Canada's domestically-produced variant of the FN MAG.
